name: King of Fighters EX: Neo Blood
description:
King of Fighters EX: Neo Blood is a bare-knuckle brawler that proves it's good to be the king on the Game Boy Advance. With more than 20 unarmed fighters and five single-player modes, King of Fighters EX: Neoblood offers plenty of choices.

In Team Play, you choose an off-screen striker and three other characters. The striker character can fly in on command to assist his or her teammates. There is also an Endless Survival mode that lets you see how long you can stay vertical against an onslaught of enemies.

Developer Marvelous Entertainment didn't skimp on the multiplayer support. King of Fighters EX: Neoblood delivers two Battle modes for two players using two GBAs, a GBA Game Link cable and two Game Paks.

King of Fighters EX: Neo Blood further establishes the Game Boy Advance as the portable home for 2D fighting games. This game has been rated "T" (Teen) by the independent Entertainment Software Rating Board.
